Croats. Beside Kutuzov sat an Austrian general, in a white uniform that looked strange among the Russian black ones. The caliche stopped in front of the regiment. Kutiizov and the Austrian general were talking in low voices and Kutuzov smiled slightly as treading heavi- ly he stepped down from the carriage just as if those two thousand men breathlessly gazing at him and the regimental commander did not exist.
